scripts.install: curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.22.2-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux_3.22.2-stable.tar.xz && git config --global --add safe.directory /vercel/path0/flutter && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && cd flutter_application && flutter config --enable-web --no-analytics && flutter pub get
scripts.build: echo 'Starting build...' && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && cd flutter_application && flutter build web --release --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --dart-define=SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY --dart-define=USDA_FOOD_DATA_API_KEY=$USDA_FOOD_DATA_API_KEY --dart-define=IS_WEB=true && echo 'Build completed, checking output...' && ls -la build/web/ && echo 'Checking for flutter.js...' && ls -la build/web/flutter.js && cp -r build/web ../web && echo 'Files copied to web directory:' && ls -la ../web/ && echo 'Checking flutter.js in web directory:' && ls -la ../web/flutter.js
